regulationsummary: The provisions set out the regulatory framework for precious metals and stones businesses, requiring Category B registrants to obtain Commissioner approval before appointing directors, to display registration certificates, and to promptly notify the Commissioner of any changes or intended cessation of business Applications must be filed in prescribed form and accompanied by the appropriate fee Registrants must comply with disciplinary orders and maintain confidentiality of information Failure to comply can result in fines, imprisonment, or disciplinary action, and the Commissioner may impose pecuniary penalties or refer matters to the Tribunal for review

actionablerules.obligation: Obtain written approval from the Commissioner before appointing a director to a Category B registrant that is a corporation
actionablerules.whoitappliesto: Corporations that are Category B registrants
risksignalstomonitor: Appointment of a director without prior written approval
Director with a history of financial crime or unfit background
requireddocumentsorcontrols: Completed application form as specified by the Commissioner
Fee payment receipt as per Schedule 3K
Fit and proper assessment report of the director
actionablerules.requiresedd: Yes, because the directors suitability must be assessed as a fit and proper person

actionablerules.obligation: Submit all applications for director approval in the form and manner specified by the Commissioner and pay the required fee
actionablerules.whoitappliesto: All entities applying for director approval under sections 53ZUW, 53ZUX or 53ZUY
risksignalstomonitor: Failure to pay the prescribed fee
requireddocumentsorcontrols: Application form in the prescribed format

actionablerules.obligation: Display the certificate of registration in a conspicuous place at the principal place of business and at each branch
actionablerules.whoitappliesto: All registrants, including those operating electronically
risksignalstomonitor: Absence of a physical display of the certificate
Electronic certificate not accompanied by a printed copy

actionablerules.obligation: Notify the Commissioner in writing within one month of any change in specified particulars, such as ownership or control
risksignalstomonitor: Delayed or missing notifications of changes
Changes in ultimate ownership or control without notification
actionablerules.requiresedd: Yes, if the change involves ownership or control, a review of the new owners suitability is required

actionablerules.obligation: Provide written notice to the Commissioner before the intended date of cessation of business or specified transactions
actionablerules.whoitappliesto: Category A and Category B registrants
risksignalstomonitor: Failure to notify cessation in advance
Sudden cessation of business without prior notice
requireddocumentsorcontrols: Written cessation notice specifying intended date
Confirmation of receipt by the Commissioner
actionablerules.requiresedd: Yes, because cessation may indicate a change in risk profile and requires assessment of remaining obligations

actionablerules.obligation: Comply with any disciplinary order issued by the Commissioner, including remedial actions and payment of pecuniary penalties
actionablerules.whoitappliesto: Category A and Category B registrants
requireddocumentsorcontrols: Evidence of remedial action taken or payment of penalty

actionablerules.obligation: Maintain confidentiality of information obtained under the Ordinance and not disclose it to unauthorized persons
actionablerules.whoitappliesto: Specified persons, including relevant authorities and their employees
